title: "New machine learning method to analyze complex scientific data of proteins"
excerpt: "Scientists have developed a method using machine learning to better analyze data from a powerful scientific tool: Nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR). One way NMR data can be used is to understand proteins and chemical reactions in the human body."
